DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to see whether heavy drinking will interfere with a specific pathway, called FXR signaling in the liver. The abnormality of this pathway may lead to liver injury in some patients who drink heavily.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Heavy Alcohol Consumption on Farnesoid X Receptor (FXR) Signaling
